title: BUILDING CONSTRUCTION TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes at SSC or its equivalent in Mathematics, English Language, Physics and any other two (2) relevant subjects
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry or Fine Arts.

title: HOSPITALITY & TOURISM
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSCE credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science,

Mathematics and any three (3) of the following:

Geography,

Food and Nutrition,

Economics,

Technical Drawing,

English Language,

Physics,

Chemistry,

Nigerian Language,

Home Economics.
subjects: Biology/Agricultural Science and two (2) of Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and Economics

title: MECHATRONICS & AUTOMATION TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSCE credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork,

Further Mathematics,

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

title: WELDING & FABRICATION
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes at SSCE or its equivalent in Mathematics, English Language and any other three (3)  relevant subjects.
